description:
The biggest of our book bags lets you bring all your textbooks, your laptop and any other academic supplies comfortably across campus. The laptop sleeve now has padding in the bottom to protect your computer when you plunk your bag down next to your desk.

  • Padded laptop compartment has a side zip. Fits up to 17in. laptops
  • Main compartment has 1 zippered pocket
  • Secondary compartment has a large zippered pocket with a key clip, 2 small zippered pockets, and pen slots
  • Outer panel has 1 large zippered pocket that will accomodate a water bottle
  • Air mesh foam on back panel for breathability, and padded shoulder straps for carrying comfort
  • Webbing handle is folded and stitched for low-profile carrying comfort
  • Adjustable sternum strap
  • Reflective strip on back for night-time visibility
  • Designed for school purposes (though it won't implode if you take it on a hike). It's built to get your rulers, erasers, laptop and books to a qualifying or accredited institution – in short, a school
name: MEC Hippocampus Book Bag
